templates_description: Select a customized Template to send a new Campaign. Also, you can duplicate it, edit it or create one.
templates_public_description: Create your Email from scratch or select a Predesigned Template to customize it.

templates_empty.description: Customize a Template and once you finish the edition, you can save it into the My Templates section to use this new version as many times you want.
templates_empty.description_link_text: Learn how to edit a Template.

viewonline_tooltip.text:
This feature is only available
for accounts with a
Paid Plan.

templates_new_popup.title: Nombrar Nueva Plantilla
templates_new_popup.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas fringilla nulla vitae vulputate scelerisque. Nunc nec augue at dui vulputate sagittis.

templates_rename_popup.title: Rename Template
templates_rename_popup.description: Write a new name to identify your Template.

templates_duplicate_popup.title: Duplicate Template
templates_duplicate_popup.description: Put a name to this new version of your Template to differentiate it.
templates_duplicate_popup.name: Copy of {{name}}

templates_delete_popup.title: Do you want to delete {{name}}?
templates_delete_popup.description: Note that you can not recover the Template once removed.

templates_validation.maxlength: Ouch! You have reached the maximum allowed length.
